mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS (PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, CLIENT_NAME, FEETYPE, PAY_MANNER, PAY_MONTH, START_DATE, END_DATE, PAYABLE, PAID_IN, VOUCHER_NUMBER, INVOICE, INVOICE_NUMBER, INVOICE_NOTES, INVOICE_STATUS, COLLECTING_COMPANY, COLLECTING_ACCOUNT, INVOICE_COMPANY, PAY_TIME, CARTE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CUSTOMER_ID, STATUS) VALUES (#{propertyFeePayDetails}, #{houseInfoId}, #{clientName}, #{costType}, #{payManner}, #{payMonth}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{payable}, #{paidIn}, #{voucherNumber}, #{invoice}, #{invoiceNumber}, #{invoiceNotes}, #{invoiceStatus}, #{collectingCompany}, #{collectingAccount}, #{invoiceCompany}, #{payTime}, #{carteTime}, #{updateTime}, #{customerId}, #{status} )
mapper.select: SELECT PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, CLIENT_NAME, FEETYPE, PAY_MANNER, PAY_MONTH, START_DATE, END_DATE, PAYABLE, PAID_IN, VOUCHER_NUMBER, INVOICE, INVOICE_NUMBER, INVOICE_NOTES, INVOICE_STATUS, COLLECTING_COMPANY, COLLECTING_ACCOUNT, INVOICE_COMPANY, PAY_TIME, CARTE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CUSTOMER_ID, STATUS FROM T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS

SELECT PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, CLIENT_NAME, FEETYPE, PAY_MANNER, PAY_MONTH, START_DATE, END_DATE, PAYABLE, PAID_IN, VOUCHER_NUMBER, INVOICE, INVOICE_NUMBER, INVOICE_NOTES, INVOICE_STATUS, COLLECTING_COMPANY, COLLECTING_ACCOUNT, INVOICE_COMPANY, PAY_TIME, CARTE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CUSTOMER_ID, STATUS, FEETYPE FROM T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS

SELECT DISTINCT PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS_ID, T_PROJECT_INFO.PROJECT_NAME, T_HOUSE_INFO_DETAILS."vhcode", CLIENT_NAME, FEETYPE, PAY_MANNER, PAY_MONTH, START_DATE, END_DATE, PAYABLE, PAID_IN, VOUCHER_NUMBER, INVOICE, INVOICE_NUMBER, INVOICE_NOTES, INVOICE_STATUS, COLLECTING_COMPANY, COLLECTING_ACCOUNT, INVOICE_COMPANY, PAY_TIME, CARTE_TIME, T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS.UPDATE_TIME, CUSTOMER_ID, T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS.STATUS, FEETYPE FROM T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS JOIN T_HOUSE_INFO_DETAILS ON T_HOUSE_INFO_DETAILS."pk_house"=T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS.HOUSE_INFO_ID JOIN T_PROJECT_INFO ON T_HOUSE_INFO_DETAILS."pk_project"=T_PROJECT_INFO.PK_PROJECT JOIN T_MANAGE ON T_HOUSE_INFO_DETAILS.MANAGE_ID=T_MANAGE."pk_manageId" JOIN T_MANAGE_USER ON T_MANAGE_USER.MANAGE_ID=T_MANAGE."pk_manageId" WHERE T_MANAGE_USER.USER_ID=#{userId} AND T_PROPERTY_FEE_PAY_DETAILS.STATUS='Y'
